metadata.title: CVE-2015-1521 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: analyzer/protocol/dnp3/DNP3.cc in Bro before 2.3.2 does not properly handlezero values of a packet length, which allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (buffer overflow or buffer over-read if NDEBUG; otherwiseassertion failure) via a crafted DNP3 packet.

criterions.comment: bro: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
